Text Decoration Thickness

# Text Decoration Thickness

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                        | Support     |
| ---------------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
decoration-auto
```      | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
decoration-from-font
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
decoration-0
```         | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
decoration-1
```         | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
decoration-2
```         | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
decoration-4
```         | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
decoration-8
```         | 🌐 Web only |
